author: Staff Reporter
text:
Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan inaugurated a kiosk for selling products of women self-help groups (SHGs) at Poomalai commercial complex in Vadaserry here recently.

He also inaugurated a recycling plant at Pambanvilai in Melasankarankuzhi panchayat.

T. Sadayappa Vinayaka Murthy, Project Director, Tamil Nadu Rural Livelihood Mission, and T. Getzi Leema Amalini, Project Director, District Rural Development Agency, were present.
title: Kiosk to sell SHG products opened
